entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:57 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -43.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 8:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -43.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -47.5°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 46.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 46. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:11 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 6:11 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:11 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
